content.prompt: For which of the following tasks would using the bar graph as currently designed be the LEAST helpful?

choices.label: Comparing whether the National Rifle Association (NRA) prefers Democrats or Republicans
Tracking the campaign spending of the NRA over time
Calculating the election cycle spending based on the intervals shown on the vertical axis
Determining which years the NRA spent the most money on elections

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain possible limitations of the visual representation of the data provided
